example.eg: John had to put a patch on his jeans, as they had a hole in them.
example.egtrans: 约翰的牛仔裤上破洞了，得打补丁。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 补丁, 补片, 布块

example.eg: There is a patch of grass between the flower bed and the vegetable patch.
Angela hit a patch of ice and skidded.
example.egtrans: 安吉拉轧到一小块冰，打滑了。

example.eg: A patch of blue sky appeared between the clouds.
example.egtrans: 云间露出了一小片蓝天。

example.eg: Your patches of white skin are caused by vitiligo.
example.egtrans: 你身上小片的白色皮肤是白癜风导致的。

example.eg: Karen sewed a Greenpeace patch onto her jacket when she was at college.
Ben used a patch to fix the problem with the software.
example.egtrans: 本用一个补丁修复了软件的问题。

example.eg: The pirate wore a patch over one eye.
Tim is using nicotine patches to help him give up smoking.
example.egtrans: 提姆用尼古丁膏药帮助他戒烟。

example.eg: Audrey is out of the office at the moment, but she's available on her mobile; I can patch you through if you like.
example.egtrans: 奥德利暂时不在办公室，但可以通过手机联系到她，如果您需要，我可以给您转接。

dsense.name: patch [sb] through to [sb/sth]
dsense.guideword: dated (telephone: connect to external line) (电话，过时用语)

example.eg: The operator patched me through to our London branch.
There was a difficult patch during Rick's teens when he fell in with a bad crowd.
Ben has patched this program and now the problem is fixed.
John has patched his jeans to hide the hole.
Hester is patching a quilt.
The police officer had a newly designed shoulder patch on his shirt.
There are no more mice in the house since I patched up the hole in the wall.
Don't worry, the doctors will patch you up in no time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仓促地包扎（或处理）伤口

example.eg: Pippa has a lot of problems at the moment; she's going through a rough patch.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 度过难关, 经历磨难
尼古丁贴剂，尼古丁贴片

dsense.name: patch things up, patch it up (with [sb])

example.eg: My friend and I had a fight, but we've patched things up now.
Sam patched a team together for Saturday's football match.
I used to go to the pumpkin patch to choose a pumpkin every Hallowe'en.
example.egtrans: 我曾经每到万圣节就去南瓜地挑选一个南瓜。
